member.name: T:IceDiscovery.LookupReplyPrx

member.name: M:IceDiscovery.LookupReplyPrx.foundAdapterById(System.String,Ice.ObjectPrx,System.Boolean,Ice.OptionalContext)
member.summary: Reply to the findAdpaterById request.
member.param: The adapter ID.
The adapter proxy (a dummy proxy created by the adapter). The proxy provides the adapter endpoints.
True if the adapter is also a member of a replica group.
The Context map to send with the invocation.

member.name: T:IceDiscovery.LookupPrx
member.summary: The Lookup interface is used by IceDiscovery clients to look for objects and adapters using UDP multicast.

member.name: M:IceDiscovery.LookupPrx.findObjectById(System.String,Ice.Identity,IceDiscovery.LookupReplyPrx,Ice.OptionalContext)
member.summary: Request to find an Ice object
member.param: The IceDiscovery domain identifier. An IceDiscovery client only replies to requests with a matching domain identifier.
The object identity.
The proxy of the LookupReply interface that should be used to send the reply if a matching object is found.
The Context map to send with the invocation.
